import React from "react"; import { Container, Button, Row, Form, Col, ListGroup, Badge, } from "react-bootstrap"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import { useCart } from "../contexts/CartContext"; export default function Checkout() { const { cartItems, subTotal, taxCost, shippingCost, totalCost } = useCart(); return (

Checkout

Your Cart {cartItems.length}

{cartItems.map((item) => { return ( {item.productName} ${(item.price * item.qty).toFixed(2)} ); })} Total (incl. shipping & tax) ${totalCost.toFixed(2)}

Billing Address

First Name Last Name Address Address 2 (Optional) City Province Postal Code

Payment

Name on card Full name as displayed on card Credit card number Expiry month Expiry year CVV
); }
